name: Magical Girls Idle
about:
The adventure of Rain, a girl who dreamed of becoming an adventurer!

Rain has been cursed by the Witch of the North.
Along with Getto the spirit, Rain begins an adventure to find the Witch of the North and lift her curse!

Meet companions during the adventure, break through stages and dungeons, and get stronger alongside them to remove Rain's curse!

★ Game Features ★
▶ Collect cute & mighty companions!
Crush dozens of monsters at once with companions who have unique and powerful abilities!
The smashing impact will knock your stress away!

▶ Impactful battles with skill mix-ups!
Melee and ranged skill modes to make battles even more exciting!
Mix up various skills and deal mighty damage!

▶ Synthesize gear into higher grades! Infinite growth!
Combine an endless amount of gear and items into even more powerful gear!
Break through the stages and infinitely grow up with stronger, even more unique gear!

▶ Boss battles on a whole other level!
Giant and destructive bosses and dangerous mimics will gang up on you!
Demonstrate your control skills and defeat mighty bosses!

▶ The adventure continues even when the game is turned off!
The excitement never ends. Acquire resources and items even when you're offline!
Grow even stronger and find the Witch of the North to lift the curse put on Rain!

■ CUSTMOER SUPPORT
If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
▶ Customer Service Email: cs@gamepub.co.kr
▶ Follow us at Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GPumbrellagirls

name: Eggy Party
about:
【Game introduction】
Welcome to the amazing party game, Eggy Party, developed by NetEase Games where you and your Eggy Friends break through absurd obstacles and experience the journey on Eggy Island, let's egg the party now!

【Game Features】
-Dive into the EGGYVERSE!
Become a cute eggy and join the lively EGGYVERSE! Here you can get ride the giant ferris wheel, the funny trampoline, floor piano, football field, and many more attractions waiting for you!
-Team up with other cute Eggies!
Team up with cute Eggies in different styles; fluffy, fantasy, sweet...choose the style that suits you! Power through obstacles together with your Eggy friends, it’s time to have fun now!
-A World full of party and play!
Join the different parties, bump and hug with friends in game! Be careful with the obstacles and avoid other Eggies! Enjoy the party with your friends and go play all night!
-Create your own maps to enjoy with your friends!
Want to try out unique maps? Come to the Eggy Workshop to discover something new. You can create your own maps here, let your imagination fly!

To learn more about Eggy Party, please visit:
• Official Website: https://www.eggyparty.com/
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/eggypartyglobal
• YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCK0y3Dls7q62xvKyiHLvUeA
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EggyPartyGlobal/
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eggypartyglobal/

• Discord: https://discord.gg/eggyparty

name: Star Chef 2: Restaurant Game
about:
👩‍🍳Hey Chefs! Are you ready to cook some delicious dishes at your restaurant? Indulge in some playtime, growing veggies on the farm, harvest them & cook a variety of exquisite cuisines from all over the world at your restaurant and serve it to your customers. With your creativity and our state of art tools, build the restaurant of your dreams!🏨

🥞Unleash the cooking fever by becoming a part of the chef community. Meet top chefs and visit their restaurants, join them, farm and cook & get the chance to win the title of by participating in cooking competitions & tournaments.🍴

🧆Cook, bake and grill your finest meals catered to the needs of diners at your hotel. Compelling simulations like live music, celebrity appearances, pool parties, farm and much more outside the restaurant kitchen are stirred up for your fun. This cooking mania will drive your entrepreneurial spirit to farm veggies, build restaurant, run hotel and manage your restaurant.👩‍💼

🍣 Enhance your cooking city, farm and cook your creative meals with our restaurant game. In this chef world, you get a chance to compete to secure the in your Restaurant🙏



✔ Easy to use & stimulating interface

✔ Fun, addictive & action-packed cooking tycoon management

✔ Showcase your chef skills, farm veggies and prepare a variety of cuisines in your hotel

✔ Make your restaurant vibrant with distinctive decors & designs

✔ Grow your own produce on a farm with backyard farming!



📖
150+ story-based quests and live the absolute chef life! Hone your management skills, farm and keep growing in the hotel kitchen of cooking madness!

🍜
Ranging from pizzas & burgers to frittatas and even waffles! Bring out the chef in you and have loads of fun with our online hotel food game.

🍽
Decorate your restaurant with unique design patterns ranging from wall decals & floor decors along with exceptional props! Revamp and renovate your restaurant with our lavish decorations.

👩‍🍳
Enhance your cooking diary with skilled international chefs. Grow your culinary skills & take part in cooking battles.

🏫
Chat and team up with your super chefs. Explore the well-knit community play features and team-up to collaborate & participate in tournaments.

📈
Top the leaderboard by competing with real chefs in skill-based PVP tournaments.

🙋‍♀️
Grasp surprising and fun historical facts about cuisines and dishes as you keep growing as a restaurant tycoon.

👩‍🌾
Begin your cooking adventure by growing fresh farm produce in your backyard.

🚚
Trade your dishes, veggies, and even unthinkable cookbook secrets!

🏆
Team Championship & Challenges to participate in and win!

🎯
Enjoy Mini Games in the comfort of your Township

PLEASE NOTE!
Star Chef 2 is a cooking simulator game to download and play. Although some fascinating game items can be purchased for real money.

: http://www.99games.in/privacypolicy.html
: http://www.99games.in/termsofservice.html


Reach out to us at: support@99games.in

Start your culinary journey, farm & live the chef life. Download Star Chef 2 now to get cooking!

name: Nextbots In Backrooms: Sandbox
about:
Description
A simple sandbox game, where you create your own scenarios.
Let your imagination loose with the wide variety of items at your nextbots: weapons, guns, cars and allies!
Nextbots follow you. Run and fight trending memes. Complete freedom of action!
Garrysmodsandbox is a fast-paced modern FPS shooter against nextbots.
Do you like online shooters and multiplayer gun games? This is the best trending 3D real-time first-person shooter sandbox. Scary games chasing on the top maps!
Unleash your creativity in building games. Craft your own world or construct simple structures online in the physics sandbox. Become a renowned builder in the world of sandbox games.
Sandbox - a popular physics simulator sandbox game. Enjoy playing alone or join your friends for an exciting multiplayer experience, whether online or offline.
Experience a 3D physics sandbox where you have complete control over a wide variety of objects in a virtual world. Explore the limitless possibilities of this sandbox environment. Whether you choose to play online with friends or offline on your own, Nextbots Sandbox offers an unparalleled sandbox experience.
If you are a fan of such games as Gmod, Garry's Mod, then this game is definitely for you! All fans Gmod, Garry's Mod will love it!
Play with your friends, you will enjoy PvP shooting on your mobile device!
Play in sandbox mode and realize your craziest ideas!
Kill other players and run away from the nextbots in playground.
If you've always wanted to play a FPS multiplayer shooter garrys, now your dreams have come true! Scary games in the Horror genre where you play hide and seek granny, or chasing boss Granny.
You will appreciate the horror "sandbox" in Big city!
Try to hide in the backroom as long as possible in the match before next boat chases and finds you. New "sandbox game" nextbots online!
"Nextbots in backrooms" contains various types of realistic weapons and cars.
The world of back rooms is a real arms war. melon playground

In the shooter, you be presented with a huge arsenal of weapons- gun for every taste!
BECOME THE STAR PLAYER: Climb the local and regional leaderboards to prove you’re the greatest gamer of them all! fps counter strike (csgo) multiplayer shooter! Best gun games :)
"Nextbots sandbox" - chase and scary creatures in this free atmospheric horror game. Discover heart-thumping terror, chase and scary creatures in this free atmospheric horror game. In the Sandbox, you can have fun with other players from all over the world and easily obtain rewards by opening gift boxes and treasure chests. Play as legends of horror and see through their eyes in a variety of Realms and unpredictable Trials. Best scary and horror sandbox game!

name: Mortal Kombat: Onslaught
about:
For eons, the realms have been locked in Mortal Kombat. Blood has been shed and lives taken in epic duels between darkness and light. Now the Elder Gods call upon YOU to step into the action and join in the battles that will determine the fate of the realms! Experience the vast world of Mortal Kombat in a cinematic, mobile-exclusive RPG journey. Build a team featuring your favorite Fighters from Mortal Kombat’s expansive history and pit them against wave after wave of blood-thirsty foes.

FIGHT IN EPIC RPG KOMBAT
For the first time in Mortal Kombat’s action-packed history, unleash total mayhem in fast-paced, strategy RPG battles of up to 10 characters at once! Assemble powerful teams of 4 classic champions—such as Raiden, Liu Kang, Scorpion, and Shao Kahn. Master kombat skills, like Kombos and Special Abilities, and create the mightiest team, fighting your way through the Earthrealm-shattering Story Mode.

COLLECT ICONIC FIGHTERS
Collect and level up iconic Mortal Kombat Fighters from a massive roster, including veterans like Sub-Zero, Johnny Cage, Jade, Kitana, Jax, Sonya Blade, and many more! Summon featured Fighters including rare, fan-favorite variants of classic kombatants like Cyrax and Smoke. Use strategy to assemble teams of 4 based on their unique fighting abilities and class-based skills to prepare for the RPG kombat action.

EXPERIENCE A NEW, EPIC STORY
Triple-A quality graphics, visceral battles, cinematic cut scenes, and brutal Fatalities like only Mortal Kombat can deliver! Duel your way through the many chapters of RPG kombat, unlocking new champions along the way and immersing yourself in the action-packed story of Shinnok’s bid for destruction.

MASTER THE STRATEGY GAMEPLAY
Build unstoppable teams, catered to the unique challenges of many different RPG game modes. Assemble a diverse roster of Assassins, Warriors, Snipers, and Defenders in preparation for the strategy action. Earn a myriad of rewards and resources to increase your Fighters’ power, evolve kombat skills, and level up Gear. Equip Relics—powerful items pulled from Mortal Kombat lore—on specific Fighters strategically and earn battle effect bonuses, even Fatalities!

DOMINATE THE KOMPETITION
Train your team, level them up, and boost their skills in Boss Tower and Chasm Modes, then take them to the Arena and challenge players from across Earthrealm to kombat. Make sure to participate in PVP Seasons, earn special Arena rewards, and climb the leaderboards to show the world what you are made of!

Play now to help save the universe from Shinnok’s evil plans and battle for victory in this new RPG experience!

Join the Konversation:
